subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andrea Guardini edged out the favored Mark Cavendish in a bunch sprint to win the 18th stage of the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Andrea Guardini edged out the favored Mark Cavendish in a bunch sprint to win the 18th stage of the Giro d’Italia.
